[File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/backup.rs] [Function: Command::run()] [Concurrent downloads] Does concurrent_downloads parameter properly limit resource usage, or can excessively high values cause memory exhaustion DoS when downloading large backups? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/backup_maintenance.rs] [Function: Command::run()] [Premature deletion] Does remove_compacted_file_after timing properly ensure files aren't deleted while still being read by restore operations, preventing data loss during active restores? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/backup_maintenance.rs] [Function: BackupCompactor::new()] [Validation bypass] Are compaction factor parameters validated to be > 0, or can zero/negative values cause division by zero or infinite loops during compaction? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/backup_maintenance.rs] [Function: Command::run()] [Metadata cache poisoning] Can corrupted metadata_cache_opt cause the compactor to reference non-existent or malicious files, leading to data loss or injection of fake backup data? (High)
